title: We Buy
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 65 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 120L
description: Shopping for new things can be lots of fun. In We Buy, a family spends the day going from store to store buying various items such as food, tools, and clothes. The colorful illustrations, repetitive text, and high-frequency words support early emergent readers. Students will also have the opportunity to connect to prior knowledge while identifying the various settings throughout the story.
meta: bank, buys, clothes, crayons, furniture, tools
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Plural Nouns : Recognize and use plural nouns
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word buy
